item.title: How to build a debian package using Go
item.description: Here is a quick example of how to build a debian package programmatically.

item.title: How to use a physical harddrive in VirtualBox
item.description: In some cases it might be very convinient to use a physical harddrive (USB stick, SD card, etc.) as a disk for a virtual machine. It is quite easy on Linux.
